response.overview: Two female ancestors known for their intense love for social media and their love for themselves, and their concept of marriage is completely different, as they live together in the same house, which leads to many problems and conflicts between them over the house. known for their intense love for social media and their love for themselves, and their concept of marriage is completely different, as they live together in the same house, which leads to many problems and conflicts between them over the house.
response.title: The Ancestors
